NOTE: Please note that our official photographer will be taking your pictures with Gurudev which will be uploaded on www.soulbook.me.

Email.template_subject: Response to appointment request {$AID} with Gurudev
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

An appointment may not be possible. However, you may take blessings from Gurudev when he enters/exits satsang. Please contact Shabnam/Chandrakanth at Secretariat office 15 mins before beginning of Satsang on that day.

 

Ps: The Vaidic Dharma Sansthan desk ( in cc ) organizes pujas & homas for various occasions. You may contact them directly in case you are interested. You may contact VDS via phone on - +91 9538186844 ( M ) / +91 80 67262639 ( O ).

Email.template_subject: Response to appointment request {$AID} with Gurudev
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

An appointment may not be possible. However, you may take blessings from Gurudev when he exits from the puja. Please contact Shabnam/Chandrakanth at Secretariat office 15 mins before beginning of the Puja (Usually Rudra puja begins at 9 am on Mondays & Devi Puja begins at 11 am on Fridays). You may call on 080-67612300/080-67262626 for exact puja timings.

 

Ps: The Vaidic Dharma Sansthan desk ( in cc ) organizes pujas & homas for various occasions. You may contact them directly in case you are interested. You may contact VDS via phone on - +91 9538186844 ( M ) / +91 80 67262639 ( O ).

Dear {$ref_name} {$ji},

 

Your appointment with Gurudev (for {$appointee_name}) is scheduled on {$date} at {$time}. Total People : {$no_people}

Kindly come to secretariat office 15 mins prior to allotted time and meet with Shabnam/ Chandrakant who will guide you.

We request you to ensure that the guests have had an ashram tour and have watched Love moves the world prior to Gurudev's appointment.

 

NOTE: Videography or photography (using mobile phones) would not be needed from your side as the Art of Living official photographer will take pictures which will be emailed the following day of the appointment.

Email.template_subject: Information regarding Pujas & Homas on your special occasion
Email.template_data:
Dear {$appointee_name} {$ji},

 

The Vaidic Dharma Sansthan desk (in cc) organizes Pujas & Homas for various occasions. You may contact them directly in case you are interested. You may contact VDS via phone on +91 9538186844 (M) / +91 80 67262639 (O).

Email.template_subject: Unable to process your appointment request
Email.template_data:
Dear {$appointee_name} {$ji},

 

We are unable to process your request at the moment. It could be due to the following reason (s):

1. Purpose not clear - We will need complete details of the reason for your appointment stating the context of the issue and the questions you have for Gurudev.

2. Details of contact person not complete - Please make sure the name, designation and contact details of the person wanting to meet and the reference person are clearly filled.

Request you to kindly re-fill in the appointment request.

Email.template_name: APPOINTMENT DATE IS LESS THAN 48 HRS
Email.template_subject: Important notification regarding your appointment request {$AID}
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

Thank you for submitting your appointment request.

Subject: {$meet_subject}

Date: {$date}

Since this request has been received on very short notice (requested appointment date is less than 48 hrs), we regret to inform you that we will not be able to process the same.

You may edit your requested appointment date to after 48 hrs on the following link www.artofliving.io

OR

You may please submit another request for another date by logging in to www.artofliving.io

Email.template_subject: We are unable to process your request at the moment
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

We are unable to process your request at the moment. It could be due to the following reason(s):

1. Purpose not clear - We will need complete details of the reason for your appointment stating the context of the issue and the questions you have for Gurudev.

2.Details of contact person not complete - Please make sure the name, designation and contact details of the person wanting to meet and the reference person are clearly filled.

3. Requested date range lapsed - Your requested dates for appointment has lapsed . An appointment was not possible during that time and therefore you had not received a message.

4. Appointment not possible due to Gurudev's limited time availability - since at any given point of time there are lots of requests for meeting with Gurudev and Gurudev has only a limited time a meeting might not be possible.

Request you to kindly edit or re-fill your appointment request with appropriate details if seeking an appointment is still relevant.
Please note that since lock down has opened at ashram, Gurudev has been giving Darshan to the course participants of ashram courses.

Email.template_subject: You had requested for an appointment with Gurudev
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

You had requested for an appointment with Gurudev. Due to unavailability of Gurudev's time, a separate appointment will not be possible. However, you may take Darshan during Darshan-line. Gurudev meets people in darshan-line usually on Wednesdays or Saturdays at 430 pm when he is at the Bangalore ashram. Gurudev's tour details can be found here : www.artofliving.org/in-en/srisriontour You will receive a message about the next darshan line.

Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

Subject:{$meet_subject}

 

Please find below details for Gurudev Darshan via Zoom below.

 

Date :
Time :
Number of People : {$no_people}
Location:{$app_location}

Please rename yourself as {$full_name} / {$meet_subject} as Zoom name.
{$email_note}

Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

Subject:{$meet_subject}

 

We acknowledge your request.You can take Gurudev's darshan on {$date} at the Shiva Temple (Near Maitri Hall) at 4.30 pm.

 

Number of People : {$no_people}

NOTE:
1) Kindly wear a facemask and maintain social distancing, please keep your hands sanitised.
2) Photography and videography from your end would not be encouraged while meeting Gurudev. Please note that Ashram official photographer will be taking your pictures with Gurudev which will be uploaded on www.soulbook.me (by the end of Feb).
3) In case of any change, you will be notified via phone/email provided.

Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

You have already submitted an appointment request with us. This is a duplicate request. Please await response for your existing request (in case you have not already received an update).

Email.template_name: Appointment not possible due to Gurudev's limited time availability
Email.template_subject: We are unable to process your request at the moment
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

We are unable to process your appointment request, due to limited time availability.

An appointment will not be possible at the moment.

Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

The date(s) for which you had requested an appointment have lapsed. An appointment was not possible during that time.
We request you to be in touch with our office, if seeking an appointment is still relevant.

Email.template_subject: We are unable to process your request
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

We are unable to accommodate your appointment request at the moment.
For further queries, please be in touch with our office.

Email.template_name: Purpose of the appointment not clear
Email.template_subject: We are unable to process your request at the moment
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

We are unable to process your request at the moment since the purpose for the appointment is not clear.
Please specify the reason for your appointment / the context of the issue and the questions you have for Gurudev.
Kindly edit your existing request (from your Profile -> My History -> Choose your Request ID -> Edit) with appropriate details, if seeking an appointment is still relevant.

Email.template_name: Designation / Contact details of the person requesting appointment is not complete
Email.template_subject: We are unable to process your request at the moment
Email.template_data:
Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

We are unable to process your request at the moment as the details of the person requesting the appointment is not clear.
Please make sure that the name, designation and contact details of the person wanting to meet Gurudev and the details of the reference person are clearly filled.
Kindly edit your existing request (from your Profile -> My History -> Choose your Request ID -> Edit) with appropriate details, if seeking an appointment is still relevant.

Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

An appointment is not possible during Navratri time. Gurudev might give a Darshan to all post Navratri. Please note that since the lockdown has opened up, Gurudev has been giving Darshan to the program participants at the Bangalore Ashram. You may register for the same. Alternatively Gurudev also gives Darshan at 4.45 pm everyday at Guru Paduka Vanam (will not be there during Navratri days)

Dear {$full_name} {$ji},

 

An appointment is not possible during Shivaratri time. Please note that since the lockdown has opened up, Gurudev has been giving Darshan to the program participants at the Bangalore Ashram. You may register for the same. Alternatively Gurudev also gives Darshan at 4.45 pm everyday at Guru Paduka Vanam (will not be there during Shivaratri day)

Request you to kindly re-fill in the appointment request.

Dear {$firstname} {$ji},
You had requested an appointment with Gurudev. You had put a date range but when exactly is your birthday/anniversary ?

SMS.template_name: G not here on requested dates
SMS.template_data:
Dear {$firstname} {$ji},
You had requested an appointment with Gurudev. Gurudev is not at Bangalore ashram in those dates. You can see Gurudev's schedule here: https://www.srisriravishankar.org/tour-schedule and refill the form of appropriate
Dear {$firstname} {$ji}, Your appointment with Gurudev has been scheduled at {$time} on {$date}. Please come to {$sms_app_location} and show this confirmation AID:{$AID} Art of Living

Dear {$firstname} {$ji}, Your appointment has been rescheduled to {$date}.Please come to Shiva Temple 15 minutes before {$time}. In case  of any further queries, please be in touch with Secretariat Office. AID:{$AID} Art of Living

Dear {$firstname} ji,

You may come to Gurukul by 8:30 am on June. Please send a screenshot of this message to Shabnam on  96633 89845 and coordinate with her.

Dear {$firstname} ji,

An appointment with Gurudev will not be possible. However as a special provision for you, you may take Darshan at Satsang entrance on June. Please send a screenshot of this message to Shabnam on +91 96633 89845 and coordinate with her.

Dear {$firstname} ji,

As you might know that during Shivratri there is a huge crowd at the Bangalore Ashram. Separate appointments during those days are not possible. However, usually Gurudev gives darshan to all the people late night after the Shivratri puja, you can take Darshan of Gurudev at that time.

Warm regards,
Vishal Merani
